title: Garfield Gets Cookin'
description: Guess who's coming to dinner? GARFIELD's back, and he's in the mood for food! In this all-new, full-color collection of comics, the tubby tabby devours doughnuts, scours for snacks, and reveals his inner love for bacon. Prepare to pig out with the cat who truly believes that the best things in life are edible!
author: Jim Davis
